mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jerome, Comte de Pagowski
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Presents to Jefferson an article which is answer to injurious attack against Poland by a Danish author, Malte-Brun, in his book "Tableau de la Pologne"; French newspapers would not publish his article; printed 3,000 copies privately; sent them to three parts of the world; sends two copies to Jefferson; wishes acknowledgment by Gen. Armstrong.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Malte-Brun, Conrad, 1775-1826
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1808 November 14, Paris, [France] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
